languages.text: Кто-то затолкал в вентиляционное отверстие смятую и окровавленную синт-шинель. Такие входят в униформу каждого блюстителя.
Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.
languages.original_text: Кто-то затолкал в вентиляционное отверстие смятую и окровавленную синт-шинель. Такие входят в униформу каждого блюстителя.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a introduit un manteau synthétique en lambeaux et taché de sang dans la bouche d'aération. Ce vêtement fait partie de l'uniforme des prévôts.
languages.original_text: Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a introduit un manteau synthétique en lambeaux et taché de sang dans la bouche d'aération. Ce vêtement fait partie de l'uniforme des prévôts.

languages.text: Jemand hat einen zerschlissenen und blutigen Synthetikmantel in die Lüftung gestopft. Derartige Stoffe sind in der Uniform jedes Enforcers enthalten.
languages.original_text: Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat einen zerschlissenen und blutigen Synthetikmantel in die Lüftung gestopft. Derartige Stoffe sind in der Uniform jedes Enforcers enthalten.

languages.text: Alguien ha metido un abrigo sintético ensangrentado en el conducto de ventilación. Estas prendas se incluyen en la indumentaria de todo el personal de seguridad.
languages.original_text: Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha metido un abrigo sintético ensangrentado en el conducto de ventilación. Estas prendas se incluyen en la indumentaria de todo el personal de seguridad.

languages.text: 誰かがボロボロで血塗れのシンセコートを通気口に押し込んだようだ。このような衣類は、すべてのエンフォーサーのユニフォームの一部を成している。
languages.original_text: Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.

traits.locale_text: 誰かがボロボロで血塗れのシンセコートを通気口に押し込んだようだ。このような衣類は、すべてのエンフォーサーのユニフォームの一部を成している。

languages.text: 有人把一件破破烂烂、血迹斑斑的合成外套塞进了通风口，每个执法者的制服中都有这样的衣服。
languages.original_text: Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.

traits.locale_text: 有人把一件破破烂烂、血迹斑斑的合成外套塞进了通风口，每个执法者的制服中都有这样的衣服。

languages.text: Birisi, havalandırmaya kan içinde kalmış paramparça bir sentetik kaban tıkmış. Bu tür giysiler, tüm infazcı üniformalarının bir parçasıdır.
languages.original_text: Someone has shoved a tattered and bloodied synth-coat into the vent. Such garments are included in every enforcer's uniform.
